Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor
ShortDescription: Northbound 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker & Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/27th
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are rerouted via State, 29th, Michigan, 31st, then resume their normal route on State due to fire department activity at State/27th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 29th, Michigan, 31st, then resume their normal route on State due to fire department activity at State/27th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute near Pulaski/33rd
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses rrtd Pulaski, I-55 Stevenson, Cicero, 31st, Kosmensky & Pulaski; 31st, Cicero, I-55 Stevenson & Pulaski due to blockage nr Pulaski/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted  in both directions due to street blockage near Pulaski/33rd.

  • Northbound buses will operate via Pulaski, I-55 Stevenson, Cicero, 31st, Kosmensky, then resume their normal route.
  • Southbound buses will operate via 31st, Cicero, I-55 Stevenson, Pulaski, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #78 Montrose  Eastbound Temporary Reroute near Montrose/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound 78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Due to extremely heavy traffic and crowding at the beach eastbound #78 Montrose buses will only provide service up to Montrose/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
